attributes.action: make swearing illegal in webpage URLs.
attributes.additional_details:
I was shocked to find how many webpages there are with obscene language in the addresses.
Sites such as http://www.fucktube.com or http://www.fucktank.com should be banned, or at least forced to change their explicit domain names.

Children have access to the internet, and although these sites are 18+, children could still be exposed to the url address, and therefore the bad language.

It's time for some more responsibility on the internet.
